doc.field: Cass Gilbert papers and architectural drawings
Cass Gilbert papers and architectural drawings

This subseries contains all the volumes relating to Cass Gilbert's architectural projects. The volumes are mainly letterbooks containing outgoing copies of correspondence or books of specifications. Other volumes include records of contracts or financial ledgers. Many of these volumes are fragile and access is dependent upon the judgment of the print room staff.
